useEditorGrammarAsCtagsLanguage.description: Force ctags to use the name of the current file's language in Atom when generating tags. By default, ctags automatically selects the language of a source file, ignoring those files whose language cannot be determined. This option forces the specified language to be used instead of automatically selecting the language based upon its extension.

extraCommandArgumentsWhenGeneratingProje.title: Extra Command Arguments When Generating Project Symbols
extraCommandArgumentsWhenGeneratingProje.description: Add extra [ctag command arguments](http://ctags.sourceforge.net/ctags.html), which usually are exclusive patterns, when generating project symbols, like `--exclude=node_modules --exclude=spec --exclude=*.html`. Default is to exclude all files ignored by git.

updateProjectTagsOnFileChange.title: Update Project Tags On File Change
